intro.title: Build Your Future with DAL-sh
intro.description: Join a team of passionate innovators who are shaping the future of technology. At DAL-sh, we believe that great people build great software. We offer a dynamic work environment where creativity thrives, skills are developed, and achievements are celebrated. Whether you're a seasoned professional or just starting your career, we provide the opportunities and support you need to excel.

positions.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
positions.description: We're seeking an experienced full-stack developer to join our core development team. You'll work on challenging projects using modern technologies and contribute to architectural decisions.
requirements: 5+ years of experience with React, Node.js, and modern JavaScript
Strong understanding of microservices architecture and RESTful APIs
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Proficiency in database design (SQL and NoSQL)
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience

positions.title: UX/UI Designer
positions.description: Join our design team to create beautiful, intuitive user experiences. You'll collaborate with developers and stakeholders to design products that users love.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in UX/UI design for web and mobile applications
Proficiency in Figma, Adobe XD, or similar design tools
Strong portfolio demonstrating user-centered design approach
Experience with design systems and component libraries
Understanding of HTML/CSS and responsive design principles
Excellent visual design and prototyping skills

positions.title: DevOps Engineer
positions.description: Help us build and maintain robust CI/CD pipelines and cloud infrastructure. You'll ensure our systems are scalable, secure, and highly available.
requirements: 4+ years of experience in DevOps or Site Reliability Engineering
Strong knowledge of Kubernetes, Docker, and container orchestration
Experience with CI/CD tools (Jenkins, GitLab CI, GitHub Actions)
Proficiency in infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
Scripting skills in Python, Bash, or similar languages
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK stack)

positions.title: Mobile Developer (iOS/Android)
positions.description: Build next-generation mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms. Work with cross-functional teams to deliver exceptional mobile experiences.
requirements: 3+ years of mobile development experience (Swift/Kotlin or Flutter/React Native)
Strong understanding of mobile UI/UX best practices
Experience with RESTful APIs and mobile app architecture patterns
Knowledge of mobile app deployment and App Store/Play Store processes
Familiarity with mobile testing frameworks and CI/CD for mobile
Portfolio of published mobile applications

positions.title: QA Automation Engineer
positions.description: Lead our quality assurance efforts by developing automated testing frameworks and ensuring software quality across all our products.
requirements: 3+ years of experience in QA automation and testing
Proficiency in test automation tools (Selenium, Cypress, Jest, Pytest)
Experience with API testing and performance testing
Strong programming skills in JavaScript, Python, or Java
Knowledge of CI/CD integration for automated testing
ISTQB certification or equivalent is a plus

positions.title: Product Manager
positions.description: Drive product strategy and execution for our software solutions. Work with engineering, design, and business teams to deliver products that delight customers.
requirements: 5+ years of product management experience in software companies
Strong understanding of agile methodologies and product development lifecycle
Excellent analytical and data-driven decision-making skills
Experience with user research and customer feedback analysis
Strong communication and stakeholder management abilities
Technical background or MBA preferred
